data_maturity_score.evidence: Use of Palantir Foundry (enterprise data platform) with focus on ontology, data lineage, and integrations suggests structured data practices. No mention of CI/CD, testing, or monitoring tools which would indicate higher maturity.

data_maturity_level.evidence: Matches score of 3 - documented processes around data modeling (ontology), platform usage (Foundry), and collaboration with stakeholders.

maturity_signals.evidence: Palantir Foundry adoption indicates modern enterprise data platform. Ontology objects and data lineage documentation suggest governance practices.

scope_creep_score.evidence: Role is focused on Palantir Foundry development, data pipelines, and ontology - no conflation with ML, DevOps, or backend development. Clear data engineering scope.

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Startup environment in defense/aerospace with 'accelerate how we design, build, and test' language suggests fast pace. Unlimited PTO is positive, but no explicit work-life balance signals.

role_clarity.evidence: Well-defined responsibilities focused on Palantir Foundry development, data pipelines, ontology, and integrations. Clear collaboration with Product Owner and other engineers.

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Low scope creep, clear role definition, but moderate overtime risk due to startup pace and defense industry demands. No major red flags.

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: Mentions collaboration with Product Owner and other Software & Data Engineers, but no specific manager or reporting line is stated.

manager_level_inferred.evidence: No manager title or level mentioned in job posting or extraction.

team_growth_velocity.evidence: Mentions 'growing our internal software capabilities' and 'accelerate how we design, build, and test' suggesting expansion, but no specific team size growth metrics.

team_composition.evidence: Mentions 'other Software & Data Engineers' but no team size or composition details provided.

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure specified in job posting or extraction.

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: Mentions 'work with stakeholders and users' and 'collaborate with Product Owner' suggesting embedded work with product/business teams.

work_life_balance_score.evidence: Unlimited PTO is a strong positive signal. No mention of on-call, weekend work, or aggressive deadlines. Defense/aerospace context may imply some pressure.

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: Equity grants and 'exciting challenges' suggest growth potential, but no explicit career paths, mentorship, or learning budget mentioned.

tech_culture_score.evidence: Use of Palantir Foundry (modern platform) and agile methodologies indicate decent tech culture. No mention of code reviews, testing, or open source.

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No mention of open source, tech blogs, conference speaking, hackathons, or innovation time.

dev_practices_mentioned.evidence: Mentions 'agile-inspired development methodologies' but no other practices like code review, CI/CD, or monitoring.

innovation_signals.evidence: Focus on 'accelerate how we design, build, and test' and 'revolutionize' suggests some innovation, but no specific R&D or experimentation culture mentioned.

tech_debt_awareness.evidence: No mention of tech debt, refactoring, or modernization efforts in job posting or extraction.

ai_integration_level.evidence: No mention of ML, AI, or data science collaboration in job posting or Pass 1 extraction. Focus is on business intelligence applications and data pipelines.

ml_tools_expected.evidence: No ML tools mentioned in job posting or extraction.

hiring_urgency.evidence: Posting will remain open until filled, minimum 3 days - standard hiring timeline. No 'ASAP' or 'immediate start' language.

competition_level.evidence: Location in Berthoud, CO (less competitive than SF/NYC), but Palantir Foundry experience is niche. Remote not allowed, limiting applicant pool.

company_stage_inferred.evidence: Founded to 'revolutionize' aerospace/defense, growing internal software capabilities, 1-5 years experience required suggests early-stage team. No mention of public status or large enterprise size.

hiring_velocity.evidence: Mentions 'growing our internal software capabilities' and 'accelerate' suggesting regular hiring, but no aggressive expansion signals.

team_size_signals.evidence: Mentions 'other Software & Data Engineers' (plural) but no specific team size. Given 1-5 years experience requirement and startup context, likely small team.

funding_stage_signals.evidence: No explicit funding stage mentioned, but 'revolutionize' and 'growing capabilities' suggest Series A/B stage. Not bootstrapped (offers equity) or public.

role_creation_type.evidence: Mentions 'growing our internal software capabilities' and 'accelerate' suggesting new role created for growth, not backfill.

strength_details: Transparent compensation ($90-115k + equity) for mid-level role
Strong modern data platform (Palantir Foundry) with ontology and governance focus
Equity grants offered - potential upside in growing aerospace/defense startup
concern_details: US citizenship/permanent residency required - no visa sponsorship
Limited career growth signals - no mentorship or promotion paths mentioned
Startup in defense/aerospace sector with potential for high pressure
best_fit_details: Mid-level DEs (1-5 years) with Palantir Foundry experience or quick learning ability
Engineers comfortable with enterprise data platforms and business intelligence applications
Candidates seeking startup environment with defense/aerospace impact
probe_details: Ask about actual team size and seniority mix of data engineers
Understand career progression opportunities and mentorship structure
Clarify expected work hours and any on-call requirements
Inquire about specific data sources and integration patterns in Foundry
leverage_details: Palantir Foundry experience is high-value and niche - negotiate accordingly
Manufacturing/IoT data experience (if applicable) is a differentiator in aerospace context
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for mid-level data engineers seeking enterprise platform experience in aerospace/defense. Transparent salary, equity, and well-defined role with Palantir Foundry. Main trade-offs are US citizenship requirement, limited growth signals, and startup pace. Best for candidates valuing mission-driven work over rapid career advancement.
